TopicTitle: Add infinite electrical charge to Alt-F12 debug menu

Articles.Content:
Subject says it all.

Judging from the Confess your KSP sins thread, a lot of people are using Alt-F12's infinite fuel cheat to save missions that would otherwise be lost. Infinite electrical charge would allow the same in some situations.

Plus, it's useful for testing.

Pretty sure infinite fuel does that...

Check though
It does. In fact it infinites (I'll just make up my own verb here) everything except RCS.

I hope you realise the debug menu wasn't included for players... it was included solely because a) the devs find it useful for bug testing, and the QA and experimental teams probably find it useful for bug testing. It's not, as far as I am aware, supposed to be of any actual gameplay use.
